thread.title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
thread.title_full: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines

author: COLLIN BINKLEY Associated Press
title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
text:
Close Steven Senne 
In this Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 photo, high school freshman Matthew Freitas, of Weymouth, Mass., talks on the sidelines during a game of flag football, in Weymouth. Freitas lost part of a leg in a car accident, but is now one of scores of disabled athletes being groomed by Adaptive Sports. (AP Photo/Steven Senne) AP US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines By COLLIN BINKLEY Associated Press 1 hr ago
